title: Duck salad with blue cheese dressing
description: This is a simple combo of ready-made confit duck legs and zingy, cheesy salad dressing with added crunch form caramel-coated pecans - a super tasty meal for two.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz St Agur blue cheese, roughly chopped
1 head Romaine lettuce, cut into 2.5cm/1in thick slices
